definition: University of International Relations, Beijing, established in 1949
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4

definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: At UIR, we have a faculty fully devoted to their mission and committed to the pursuit of excellence in both teaching and research.
sentences.chinese: 国际关系学院拥有一支忠诚敬业的优秀教师队伍。

sentences.english: The writer is a research fellow at Taiwan's National Chengchi University.
sentences.chinese: 作者是台湾国立政治大学国际关系学院研究员。
